front.title: Telephone Number Mapping and Domain Keys as a Distributed Identity Infrastructure

abstract.t: This document creates a decentralized indentity infrastructure by combining technology from E.164 Number Mapping (ENUM) and DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM). This infrastructure uses E.164 numbers as identities, ENUM DNS for key distribution, and leverages the trust relations from ENUM validation to actual messages signed by the number holder.
